main event: Witnesses observed three red lights in a triangular formation traveling at high speed before disappearing behind trees.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes., The lights were described as bright and red., Witnesses noted the lights traveled at a speed faster than normal jets., The objects faded into the horizon after their appearance., There were multiple witnesses present during the event.
sighted object: three red lights in triangular formation
witness description: Civilians, including individuals identified but redacted in the report.
